definitions.definition: An arrangement whereby several people travel together in the same car in order to save costs , reduce pollution etc.
examples: The neighbors decided on a carpool to get their kids to school, so that they wouldn't each have to drive every day.

definitions.definition: The group of people who participate in such a pool.

main_definition: An arrangement whereby several people travel together in the same car in order to save costs , reduce pollution etc.
secondary_definitions: The group of people who participate in such a pool.
